channel.title: Special won't hit?
channel.description: I've added a special attack, put the case in special.java, added it in client.java , but the special still won't hit.

item.title: Special won't hit?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“dualcourse, post:3, topic:267545”]you dont have to…simply wateva item you added special attack to add it in item.cfg and then when done ull see lots of 0s and low numbers those are the bonuses of that weapon maybe they are reali low and hitting rubbish.
rep please[/quote]
Please stop posting if you don’t know what you’re talking about.

On Topic -
Post your special methods.
